child.field: Here you define whether the slider for this element should be initialized.
Here you can define the color of the navigation (dots).
Here you can define the color of the controls (arrows).
Controls animation behaviour. With carousel everything slides to the side, while gallery uses fade animations and changes all slides at once.
Height of slider container changes according to each slide's height.
Moves throughout all the slides seamlessly.
Moves to the opposite edge when reaching the first or last slide.
Allows using arrow keys to switch slides.
Swipe or drag will not be triggered if the angle is not inside the range when set.
Number of slides being displayed in the viewport.
Number of slides going on one "click".
Slide that will be shown first
Space on the outside of the slider
Controls the display and functionalities of controls components (prev/next buttons/arrows).
Controls the display and functionalities of nav components (dots).
Toggles the automatic change of slides.
Direction of slide movement (ascending/descending the slide index).
Height of slider container changes according to each slide's height.
Allows using arrow keys to switch slides.
